snippet: The Arab League said on Tuesday that 11 of its monitors in Syria had been attacked and "lightly injured" as they traveled through the northwestern city of Latakia this week.
abstract: The Arab League said on Tuesday that 11 of its monitors in Syria had been attacked and "lightly injured" as they traveled through the northwestern city of Latakia this week.
lead_paragraph: The Arab League said that 11 of its monitors in Syria sustained "light" injuries on Monday during an attack "by pro-regime elements in Latakia," a northwestern port city.

headline.main: Video Shows Attack on Arab League Monitors in Syria

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
